entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as the one who changed tack at the speed of light and also made a comment about Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned multiple times in the conversation, with Ron accusing him of not asking for help and Hermione wanting him to win the tournament.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as saying she would never help Harry work out what his egg means.

relationships.description: Ron accuses Harry of not asking for help.
Hermione wants Harry to win the tournament and shows her support for him.
Ron makes a comment that suggests he disagrees with Hermione's opinion of Harry.
Hermione is outraged by Ron's comment and they seem to be in disagreement.
